title: Saag aloo side dish
ingredients: ['1 medium to large potato', 'salt', '1 tablespoon ghee or groundnut oil', '1/2 teaspoon black mustard seeds', '1/4 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 onion, finely sliced', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon finely chopped fresh ginger', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 to 1 green chilli, deseeded and finely chopped', '2 heaped tablespoons chopped frozen spinach']
